name: WhiTaers
description: This is a visual novel about 20 minutes in length, telling a story of memories.The story consists of two weeks and eight clues overlapping each other.It tells the world of male masters' memories and reality.WhiTaers is a story about the protagonist looking for himself from being lost.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 2GHz Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 625M Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i3 3GHz Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti Storage: 500 MB available space
